title: Scrapbooking ID-a-thon
content:
Can you ID these fonts for me? Puhlease? Pretty Puhlease? With Sugar on top and a healthy dollop of appreciation?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scrapbookingcraze.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [scrapbookingcraze.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/typophile.com/files/scrapbookingcraze_0.png) | 77.58 KB |

 [‹ (x) "bride" modern serif - DeVinne {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/typophile.com/node/18644 "Go to previous forum topic") [Ms. Pamela Mann script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/typophile.com/node/18626 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
Studio looks like [Futura Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.47.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Studio&sampleSize=48).  
Marisa looks like [Lucida Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.100663.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Marisa&sampleSize=48).  
Eliza looks like [Goodfellow](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/goodfellow/) (although the ’l’ is somewhat different).

- Lex

Eliza is Glorietta, which has another name now, I’ll look it up. Ok, it’s now called P22 Victorian Swash.

Abigail looks like Willow

Katie might be Randumhouse from House Industries, will check on that (edit: NOPE, but it still looks House-y to me)
Oh, Sorry. Katie is from Font Diner. I do know that one.

Stiletto is from Font Diner’s TV Dinner collection.

- Lex

sorry for jumpin the gun with this one, tiff. i guess i should have sent you the key too: [http://cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/commercialfonts2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/commercialfonts2.html "http://cgm.cs.mcgill.ca/~luc/commercialfonts2.html") look for quicKutz

Olivia is Stovetop from Font Diner’s Lunch Box set

[http://www.fontdiner.com/menu\_lunch.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071019125538/http:/www.fontdiner.com/menu_lunch.html "http://www.fontdiner.com/menu\_lunch.html")

Here is the low down:

Abigail is Willow  
Calvin is Butterfinger  
Emily is Pointed Brush  
Ginger is Sunnydale  
Olivia is Stove Top  
Stiletto is Stiletto  
Lucy is Poodle Pusher  
Maggie is Retro Fit Bold  
Marisa is Lucida Handwriting  
Studio is Futura Condensed Bold  
Katie is Font Diner  
Frankie is Snoopy Sails NF  
Phoebe is Lime House  
Eliza is P22 Victorian Swash  
Paige is P22 Garamouche  
Khakii is Benderville  
Marisa is Lucida Handwriting  
Star is Comic Strip Poster

Did I miss any? All the fonts are legally licenced from the proper font houses.  
I should know I work for the CUTE industry. YUM.
Dan, I’ll admit I was witch hunting, but then found out that all was legal. Kudos to your company for doing the right thing.
